entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ARM64 Vector2 multiplication breaks in .NET 8 #98137
  • dump system log on macos when test run terminates unexpectedly #98132
  • runtime-official build broken for linux/sourcebuild #98130
  • NativeAOT result binary on macOS targets latest SDK #98124
  • Cross-platform, solutions and answers #98123
  • Mac OS X: System.Diagnostics.Process mis-reporting CPU usage (dramatically) on Apple Silicon #98121
  • [debugger][mt][browser] TestDebugUsingMultiThreadedRuntime times out #98110
  • [API Proposal]: Add IndexOfAny string[] overloads #98106
  • [API Proposal]: Support parsing server-sent events (SSE) with HttpClient response #98105
    9.0.0
  • [mt][browser] `HttpClient_CancelInDifferentThread` failing with operation cancelled #98101
    9.0.0
  • ARM64: redundant overflow and divbyzero checks #98100
    9.0.0
  • [aot] Library tests failures on Windows, assertion `elems <= MAX_VECTOR_ELEMS / 2' not met #98099
  • [browser] rename test scenario normal to WasmTestOnV8 #98092
    9.0.0
  • [browser][debugger] Firefox EvaluateOnCallFrame2Tests #98086
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] Expected exception not thrown in linux-musl arm64: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.WriteCanceled_NextWriteThrows #98078

Closed

  • XUnitLogChecker: Unable to find dumps in Linux #96818
    9.0.0
  • [Feature Request]: Only include packages when not provided by the framework #97937
  • String.Join Different results on different operating systems Windows/Linux #71990 #98116
  • Blazor WASM (8.0 RC2) does not work on iOS 15.8 #96748
    8.0.x
  • HttpClient send MultipartFormDataContent / Azure WAF Multipart request body failed strict validation #98089
  • [debugger][mt][browser] `TestDebugUsingMultiThreadedRuntime` times out #98108
  • Vector512.Create doesn't work as expected #97924
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] StackFrameIterator.ShouldSkipRegularGcReporting is dead code #97620
  • Invalid codegen for custom IL with ldtoken #97949
    9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] AsyncTransactionScopeTests.VerifyBYOTSyncTSNestedAsync - Value is not null #97513
    9.0.0
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Add SIMD support for vector constructors using other vectors #97815
  • When compiling NativeAOT, is the deferred information stored in a PDB file with field pointers like in C++? #97346
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] NativeAOT Guide : How To Debug NativeAOT? NativeAOT Update Suggestions #97804
  • Json source generator compiler error using reserved property names and DefaultIgnoreCondition #98050
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json doesn't support KeyedCollection when serializing with source generation #97617
    Future
  • .NET 9 createdump crashes while creating coredumps #98023
  • SVE_GT_4A #98073
  • ValueType.Equals could short-circuit for reference equality #6421
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add custom error handling for BackgroundService #94403

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add IF_SVE_GU_3*, IF_SVE_GX_3*, IF_SVE_FF_3*, IF_SVE_GY_3B #98136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve, 9.0.0
  • Remove `GetDomain` functions on assorted method/type/assembly classes which are always in the single app domain #98135
    area-VM-coreclr
  • fix SendTo with SocketAsyncEventArgs #98134
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Allow mono to reuse the shared memmove implementation #98133
    area-GC-mono
  • Fix TensorPrimitives.FusedMultiplyAdd #98131
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Added more verbose error message when calling method using reflection and target type does not match passed type #98129
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fix missing short stack define #98128
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #98127
    os-ios, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Ensure that the various `Max*Number` and `Min*Number` APIs optimize correctly #98125
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Don't pass c/c++ specific flags for .asm files on Windows #98122
    area-Build-mono
  • Support for WASI threads #98120
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-wasi
  • Ensure the IBinaryInteger.RotateLeft/Right DIMs use unsigned right shift #98119
    area-System.Numerics
  • [browser][MT] deputy #98118
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use new MacOS arm64 pool for official builds #98117
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that Vector512 uses the same patterns as Vector64/128/256 #98115
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • ARM64: Optimize overflow and divbyzero checks with assertions #98113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [debugger][mt][browser] Disable `TestDebugUsingMultiThreadedRuntime` that times out #98111
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • Reduce Linq usage in FileSystemGlobbing #98109
    area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • JIT: Generalize jump threading very slightly #98107
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Propagate installers in runtime output in VMR build #98104
    needs-area-label
  • Restore RSA 16384 tests to innerloop #98102
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • JIT: Canonicalize loop exits #98096
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][mt] Enable `M.E.L.C.Test.SimpleConsoleFormatterTests.Log_WritingScopes_LogsWithCorrectColorsWhenColorEnabled` #98095
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • Move wasm threading library tests job from runtime-extra-platforms to runtime #98094
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • [browser] remove memory snapshot feature #98093
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update Bionic docs #98088
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][wasi] Throw error when WasmBuildNative is explicitly set to false during a single-file build #98087
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_CT_3A #98085
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Disable linker warning LNK4104 when building native AOT libraries #98084
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Fix STJ SG regression in handling of property names that are reserved keywords. #98082
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.x
  • [6.0] Add RIDs for Fedora 40 and Ubuntu 24.04 #98080
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [7.0] Add RIDs for Fedora 40 and Ubuntu 24.04 #98079
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Intrinsify LoadVector64x* and LoadVector128x* #98077
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Remove unused flag in Uri #98076
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Clear _cacheInvalid flag after rebuilding limiter cache in DefaultPartitionedRateLimiter #98075
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add span-based Uri {Try}{Un}EscapeDataString overloads #98074
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Add internal nuget to package tasks, and targets for workload testing #98019
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [workloads] Also process the win-arm64 android cross packs #98061
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use VM's copy of daccess.h #97751
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Sve.IsSupported support #97814
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Disable vector ctors intrinsics on wasm #98114
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [browser][mt] Fix `package microsoft.netcore.app.runtime.mono.multithread.browser-wasm is not found` #98083
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Late cast expansion: remove the null check if possible #97234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][debugger] Disabling tests failing on Firefox #98103
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Ensure that Vector512 uses the same patterns as Vector64/128/256 #97990
    area-System.Numerics
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Add SIMD support for vector ctors #98037
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Improve Math.Round, Math.ILogB, and do some minor cleanup of Half, Single, and Double #98040
    area-System.Numerics
  • Use NetTool* TFM properties for msbuild tasks #98098
    area-Build-mono
  • Take into account the local involved in GT_SWITCH for resolution #97713
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove StackFrameIterator.ShouldSkipRegularGcReporting #98081
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add encoding for ARM64 IF_SVE_CJ_2A instruction group #97885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • BitCast<TYP_REF>(TypeHandleToRuntimeTypeHandle(clsHandle)) => nongc obj #97955
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][mt] Improve blocking wait detection and tests #98045
    area-VM-threading-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] AsyncTransactionScopeTests.VerifyBYOTSyncTSNestedAsync - Value is not null #97977
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] withDumpThreadsOnNonZeroExit #98052
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • STJ: Skip usage of indexer for KeyedCollection #97734
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix STJ SG regression in handling of property names that are reserved keywords. #98058
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Delete useless delegate virtual methods #97959
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Deduplicate LSDA data in the object writer #97972
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update branding to 6.0.28 #98056
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 7.0.17 #98057
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 8.0.3 #98059
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove strtok, strtok_s, wcstok_s PAL APIs #98008
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Add implementations for MakePointerType(), MakeArrayType() for GenericTypeParameterBuilder #97350
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Tests for ByRef generics and ByRef implementing interfaces #98070
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Always assign edge likelihoods in fgIncorporateProfileData #98054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add build analysis config file to runtime #97465
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: stopping preference for ML CSE heuristic #98063
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_ID_2A` to `SVE_JH_2A` #98015
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Handle NativeOverlapped* coming from both the Windows or Portable thread pool in NativeRuntimeEventSource #97365
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Fix consistency issue in GetKeyedServices with AnyKey #97561
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Use 1MB fallback stack when procfs fails #83271
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove HELPER_METHOD_FRAMEs from built-in marshalers #97432
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Fast field access #97784
    area-System.Reflection
  • Improved uninitialized object creation performance #98016
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Disable jiterpreter_do_jit_call to address issues with disabling Wasm EH on 8.0. #98051
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove CoreCLR math.h CRT PAL Redefines #98048
    area-Meta
  • Change stack size on all desktop platforms to at least 1.5MB #98007
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove built-in COM interop support from Mono runtime #97789
    area-Interop-mono
  • Update MicrosoftBuildVersion to latest #98006
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update diasymreader.native to 17.8.0-beta1.23475.2 #97356
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Use faster write barriers when we know the target address is on the heap #97953
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Test #96806
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix interpreter #97935
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Mark most specific static DIM for types marked RelevantToVariantCasting #97487
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Use standard xunit test runner on multithreaded runtime #91317
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Suppress unused variable warnings for PERFTRACING_DISABLE CMake vars #98004
    area-Build-mono
  • Do not use AllocHGlobal in Pkcs12Reader #97447
    area-System.Security
  • Update TensorPrimitives to vectorize for size(T) is 1 or 2 #97835
    area-System.Numerics
  • [NativeAOT] Convert operand of newarr to int when producing reverse P/Invoke array marshalling #98025
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Skip ComputeReturnFlags in ArgIteratorTemplate::HasRetBuffArg #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Fix debugger support #97213
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Fix: unmanaged memory leak on parsing ill-formed certificates #93647
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] test GC #97970
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Build support for linux-bionic-arm / linux-musl-arm #97996
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Windows implementation of NegotiateAuthenticationPal.GetMIC #98031
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [NativeAOT][8.0] Use ld_classic in ILC build and in build integration #97856
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Allow valuetype sharing for more sizes. #97860
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that constant folding for SIMD shifts on xarch follow the correct behavior on overshift #98066
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #97072
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #97071
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #97070
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Blank app pulls in 50K+ bytes of Itanium demangler code #2511

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Initial precise LSSA implementation #2510

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix the missing time zone data index #2504
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Zero-diff refactoring of LSSA #2509
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet CLI commands from Wine within Azure agent job no longer work in .NET 7/8 #38613

Closed

  • add output format support for dotnet tool list command #37239
    Backlog
  • PublishSingleFile=true does not work correctly in a multi project build #3925
  • Unified Build control update #27562

PullRequests

Created

  • backport: Verbosity Options default to minimal from quiet in tool install #38612
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #38610
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38609
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38608
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Make the use of the Roslyn toolset package an opt-in #38568
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Define RuntimeIdentifierGraphPath in outer-build #38185
    Servicing-approved, Area-NetSDK, 8.0.1xx
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2372344 #38207
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add tool list format option #37394
    Approved to merge, untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-Tools
  • [Issue #37501] Verbosity Options default to `minimal` from `quiet` in `tool install` #38277
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • DotNetOrchestrator->DotNetBuildOrchestrator #38606
    untriaged, Area-FSharp
  • Remove high priority message from test target #38573
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to Unified Build controls #38506
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.117 #38578
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.407 #38580
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add Install Records for VS Managed Workloads During 'Update' #38346
    Area-Workloads
  • Update for loc #37985
    localization, Area-Infrastructure
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Open issues: Breaking changes #7918

PullRequests

Created

  • Meetings 2024 Feb/March #7920

Merged

  • Update `Lock` object speclet #7921
  • Add async experiment to schedule #7919

Updated

  • Add proposal for partial type inference #7582
  • Determine element type for write-only CollectionBuilder collection types #7895
  • Interceptors open issues for C# 13 #7835

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Automatically proffer and register remote brokered services into Roslyn LSP #71998

Closed

  • Suggested fix to IDE0030 on Nullable Int results in CS0019 #67770
    17.10
  • Dynamic invocation of a local function succeeds unexpectedly when there is a ref kind mismatch for a 'dynamic' argument. #71399
  • Gold bars while editing code using compound assignment #71980
  • String.Jion Different results on different operating systems Windows/Linux #71990
  • [Bug] Language server extension dlls with analyzers and MEF parts get loaded twice into different ALCs #71100

PullRequests

Created

  • Params parameters are implicitly scoped when their type is a ref struct. #72000
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • WIP: Cache frozen partial solution snapshots acquired off of a solution instance #71999
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Remove the AllSyntaxTreesParsed compilation tracker state. #71997
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Remove hte NoCompilationState singleton, and use 'null' for it instead. #71996
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce dictionary resizes under NodeMapBuilder.AddToMap #71995
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Wait for navigation to complete #71994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove generator info from initial 'no compilation' tracker state. #71993
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Modify CpsDiagnosticItemSourceProvider.CreateCollectionSource to be resilient to being passed a disposed hierarchy item. #71991
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert dotnet installation #71988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement control flow graph for Lock object feature #71987
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Break out the IsFrozen flag to be an aspect of CompilationTrackerState. (first commit) #71986
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Inline hints - do not produce tags if using lsp editor #71985
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Align `params` type validation with the the spec #71918
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Fix central package versioning picking up Version.Details.xml #71984
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add contract call in core compilation tracker. #71992
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disallow ref kind mismatch for dynamic arguments in non-ComImport scenarios. #71923
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Beef up type inferrer #71982
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • CompilationOutputInfo.AssemblyPath should be a normalized path #71975
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add `Lock` object feature #71716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Respond to VS LSP diagnostic breaking changes #71967
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Refactors LSP server extension assembly loading #71862
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Onboard C# Intellisense page to Unified Settings #71780
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid binding lambdas unnecessarily in some error scenarios #59733
    Area-Compilers, 17.9
  • [VB] Improve casting from floating-point or decimal types to integer types in more cases #71838
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix invariant-breaking parsing of errant case clauses in switch expressions #71960
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Definition items #71959
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Only request the necessary document and project in GraphBuilder.PopulateMapsForFileInputNode #71977
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Let the formatter format the whitespaces when converting an ArrowClauseExpression to a ReturnStatement when applicable #71757
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Break out the IsFrozen flag to be an aspect of CompilationTrackerState. #71976
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle Lock type in VB #71927
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined conversions #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Avoid visiting reachable local functions with default state #71679
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Patterns: Expand non-negative sets when performing certain operations #71968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Improve use of SyntaxContext in snippet and method/type import completion providers #71872
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Globally configured InteractiveServer breaks RCL razor pages #53882
  • Allow deletion of Data Protection keys #53880
  • Logging scope opt-out #53879
  • ASPNET Core 8.0 Identity Facebook External Provider Integration does not work. "The oauth state was missing or invalid." #53878
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #53877
  • Perf regression: json #53876
  • CookiePolicyMiddleware modifies CookieOptions, leading to bugs if it's reused #53875
  • Quickgrid with Virtualize=true not displaying the data. #53872
  • Blazor WASM "Debug Adapter" fail to handle breakpoints when a Web Worker is present #53871
  • Duplicate template ids warning in VS #53869
    9.0-preview2
  • Invalid Anti-Forgery Token on OIDC Response #53868
  • Invisible namespace for other projects under specific folder name #53867
  • Perf regression: updates #53865
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, multiple_queries #53864
  • [Blazor] Navigating to a page will scroll to top before rendering new page #53863

Closed

  • Setting Application name using WebApplicationOptions causes FileNotFoundException #53791
  • Can't sent byte[] from the client to the SignalR hub #53824
  • How to publish on Azure .NET 8 Blazor Web App with Interactive Auto on CLI? #53329
  • blazor server firefox Uncaught (in promise) WebSocket is not in the OPEN state #53721
  • Dependency Injection is not working in Blazor Webassembly Layout Page #53808
  • Error: System.InvalidOperationException: Method calls cannot be formatted in InputNumber & InputTextArea #53834

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Pass the member info directly #53874
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] SignalR performance: track groups per connection, remove on disconnect #53862
    area-signalr, 8.0.x

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Update yarn.msbuild #53850
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.17
  • [release/6.0] Update yarn.msbuild #53851
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.28
  • [release/8.0] Update Yarn.msbuild #53849
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Fix casing of ProblemDetails for RFC compliance #53792
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 8.0.3
  • SignalR performance: track groups per connection, remove on disconnect #53486
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview2
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Avoid fetching new page content when only the hash changes #53542
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.3

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [BUG] Content of a ContentPage doesn't occupy full height when page is pushed to PrismNavigationPage #20418
  • ListView Control Behaviour Broken #20416
  • `ColorTypeConverter` omits alpha channel when converting to string #20411
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]The monkey's location information is too long to be fully displayed. #20410
  • Flaky tests in windows with some controls #20409
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Window was already activated #20408
  • Bottom and right side of Border are cut off when layout size changes #20407
  • A possible use case for contentRootRelativePath being overridable #20405

  • Not able to update CollectionView header #19379

  • Android splashscreen SVG not shown #16159

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • I found an issue related to parentheses within a query in entity framework core. #33026
  • Incompatibility with Dbcontext, DbFunction and Interface #33025
  • Update command order with computed columns and unique constraints #33023
  • I found an issue related to parentheses within a query in entity framework #33024
  • Some unneeded columns are still not pruned in OPENJSON WITH #33022
  • Infinity loop when joining entities #33021
  • Query: improve exception message we throw when trying to use Include on a complex type #33018

Closed

  • Missing package README file #31947
    8.0.3
  • String properties with indexes are compared case insensitively on SQL Server #32898
    8.0.3
  • Owned entity on genericly typed entity generates unwanted steps in new migrations #32763
    8.0.3
  • Exception when using FromSql on entity with ComplexProperty #32699
    8.0.3
  • Constructor calls when using inheritance with owned entities causes exceptions #31353
    8.0.3
  • IndexOutOfRange for EntityEntry.GetDatabaseValues() with complex type and TPH #32701
    8.0.3
  • Dotnet-ef mismatch causes apply Entity Framework migration fails when publishing an individual web app. #32782
    8.0.3
  • NullReferenceException in Get-Migration in EF Core 8 #32732
    8.0.3
  • SQL Server Migrations - SqlOperation.Sql is stripped of all empty lines #32730
    8.0.3
  • Query never returns when DB value for column mapped to primitive collection is '' #32896
    8.0.3
  • Using SqliteConnection from an ASP.NET MVC (.NET Framework) application results in a few different exceptions #32614
    8.0.3
  • Skip Navigation issue with Many to Many join #32857
  • Migration class name can clash with column data types #32983
  • Unable to create a 'DbContext' of type ''. The exception 'Unable to resolve service for type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContextOptions`1[Project3.Data.TestContext]' while attempting to activate 'Project3.Data.TestContext'.' was thrown while attempting to create an instance. For the different patterns supported at design time #32936
  • [Microsoft.Data.Sqlite] iOS apps are terminated every time they enter the background if they share an encrypted database with an app extension #32863
  • [Question] Configuring json columns #32858

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fix OPENJSON postprocessing with split query (#32978) #33027
  • Fix to #32911 - ComplexProperty with AsSplitQuery #33020

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #33019
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #33017
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Update branding to 7.0.17 #33015
  • [release/8.0] Stop using case-insensitive comparisons for indexed properties (#32899) #32919
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Stop specifying incorrect column name in snapshot for owned type of generic entity type #32963
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Add complex type mappings to the default relational mappings #32901
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Handle complex types in GetDatabaseValues #32894
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Use the unpatched shared framework as the minimum requirement for tools. #32869
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Don't assume that FK of skip navigation is non-null #32925
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Stop stripping new lines from migration script literals (#32788) #32851
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Throw for empty strings in primitive collection columns #32928
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
